company: Big Bad Wolf Book Sale Malaysia
role: as Children Book Section Floor Crew
content: I was part of the floor crew under children book section area, giving the Big Bad Wolf Book Sale the largest book sale in the world, I have developed myself to be able to cope with Mount Everest sized of messy books.

company: Big Bad Wolf Book Sale Malaysia
role: as Children Book Section Sub Team Leader
content: Return to the book sale as Sub Team Leader. More responsibility as leading a small rookie team is needed this year. Book restocking, reporting to main leader be familiar with books' placement was the job scope.

role: as Interface Developer Intern, Front End Web Programmer
content: When I fell in love in programming, flash banner, facebook social campaign page, interactive website were the best companion during that time.
I was having a strong will to dive into iOS App Development and decided give it a go, the time where I met objective-C, and messing with it around. Have an app published up on AppStore.

A 7 months' contract to be part of a young and fast growing e-commerce platform which under one of the largest TV broadcasting brand - Astro. Product page description, web banner, e-newsletter design are in the job scope.

The farthest place I ever travel from my home, living in a totally fresh and new place â€“ New Zealand. It is a total fun and great experience by working as something completely different than what I used to do and mixing with local people.

role: as Drupal Front End Web Developer/ Designer
content: One of the powerful CMS in the market, specialise in front end aspects, from custom theming to custom site structure that build around clients' needs.

I just cannot tell how much I love design and programming, the passion is as strong as the day I started it all, I love seeing myself getting better along the way. Keep exploring different ways to achieve better results is the biggest satisfaction of everything.
